name: Annual audit of accounts of clerk
text: §560:3-1214  Annual audit of accounts of clerk.  Any other law to the contrary notwithstanding, the comptroller of the State shall audit not less frequently than annually the accounts and transactions of the clerks of the courts in their official capacity as conservators or as personal representatives of small estates, and report the results of the audit to the judges of the respective courts. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1; am L 2004, c 161, §27]
